alert.note: Alert for Benton; Henry (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 09 at 12:56PM CST by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTHEASTERN BENTON AND CENTRAL HENRY COUNTIES THROUGH 130 PM CST... At 1256 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Paris, moving east at 65 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Paris, Paris Landing State Park, Springville, Big Sandy, Haigler Ridge, Manleyville, Old Springville, Buchanan, India, Sunnyside, Spring Creek, Porter Court, Pine Hill, and Big Sandy Unit Tennessee National Wildlife Refuge. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 700 PM CST for west Tennessee.
